personal_information.name: Louis Cayle McKernan
personal_information.professional_summary: A seasoned technologist with over 16 years of experience in automation and a deep focus on AI/ML over the last 3 years. My expertise spans across various technologies, including 7 years of RPA with proficiency in UiPath, Pega Robotics, and strong foundations in various programming languages such as Python, C#, and SQL. I've led projects ranging from real estate fraud detection to dynamic chatbots and machine learning-driven invoice processing, with a consistent focus on AI-driven solutions and enterprise architecture.

responsibilities: Spearheaded the design and development of intelligent automation architectures.
Led technical direction for both US-based and offshore teams.
Developed AI systems for real estate fraud detection and invoice processing.
Integrated Yardi, Salesforce, and Microsoft systems via APIs.
Created a Druid chatbot for website integration using UiPath API.
Developed systems to synchronize data across vendors and SAP using SQL and OCR.

projects.description: Developed AI-driven real estate fraud detection system using OpenCV, reducing detection-to-resolution from ~30 days to 1-2 days.
Created an AI-powered chatbot named Artey deployed to 380,000+ CVS Health users; integrated with systems like Workday and ServiceNow for enterprise automation.
Created Druid chatbot for dynamic customer interaction on Allied Electronics' website, handling part lookups, quotes, and alerts.
Engineered RPA solution for Navy Supply Chain automation; reduced week-long process to under 30 seconds.
Developed automation for sentiment analysis at TelStrat using various RPA tools and custom C# implementations.
